title: BRIEF-PTFC Redevelopment Says Appointed Ron Allan M. Gacutan As Vice President And Compliance Officer
text:
BRIEF-PTFC Redevelopment Says Appointed Ron Allan M. Gacutan As Vice President And Compliance Officer

Stock Markets 15 minutes ago (Oct 07, 2019 14:40)

BRIEF-PTFC Redevelopment Says Appointed Ron Allan M. Gacutan As Vice President And Compliance Officer Oct 7 (Reuters) - PTFC Redevelopment Corp :

* APPOINTED RON ALLAN M. GACUTAN AS VICE PRESIDENT AND

COMPLIANCE

OFFICER



Source text for Eikon: ID:nPSXq1Wjb

Further company coverage: TFC.PS
